https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aPulAJ81joUMYlC6epEmgNcOGRF.jpg A blind, but deadly, gunman, is hired to escort fifty mail order brides to their miner husbands. His business partners double cross him, selling the women to bandit Domingo. Blindman heads into Mexico in pursuit. Blindman
